Accurate Attack.name: Accurate Attack
Accurate Attack.description: Trade effect DC for attack bonus.

Agile Feint.name: Agile Feint
Agile Feint.description: Feint using Acrobatics skill or Speed rank

All-out Attack.name: All-out Attack
All-out Attack.description: Trade active defense for attack bonus.

Animal Empathy.name: Animal Empathy
Animal Empathy.description: Use Interaction skills normally with animals.

Artificer.name: Artificer
Artificer.description: Use Expertise (Magic) to create temporary magical devices.

Assessment.name: Assessment
Assessment.description: Use Insight to learn an opponent's combat capabilities.

Attractive.name: Attractive
Attractive.description: Circumstance bonus to interaction based on your looks.

Beginner's Luck.name: Beginner's Luck
Beginner's Luck.description: Spend a hero point to gain 5 temporary ranks in a skill.

Benefit.name: Benefit
Benefit.description: Gain a significant perquisite or fringe benefit.

Chokehold.name: Chokehold
Chokehold.description: Suffocate an opponent you have successfully grabbed.

Close Attack.name: Close Attack
Close Attack.description: +1 bonus to close attack checks per rank.

Connected.name: Connected
Connected.description: Call in assistance or favors with a Persuasion check.

Contacts.name: Contacts
Contacts.description: Make an initial Investigation check in one minute.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description: Use Deception or Intimidation to daze an opponent.

Defensive Attack.name: Defensive Attack
Defensive Attack.description: Trade attack bonus for active defense bonus.

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.description: +1 active defense bonus to Toughness per rank.

Eidetic Memory.name: Eidetic Memory
Eidetic Memory.description: Total recall, +5 circumstance bonus to remember things.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: Circumstance bonus to avoid area effects.

Extraordinary Effort.name: Extraordinary Effort
Extraordinary Effort.description: Gain two benefits when using extra effort.

Fascinate.name: Fascinate
Fascinate.description: Use an interaction skill to entrance others.

Fast Grab.name: Fast Grab
Fast Grab.description: Make a free grab check after an unarmed attack.

Favored Environment.name: Favored Environment
Favored Environment.description: Circumstance bonus to attack or defense in an environment.

Favored Foe.name: Favored Foe
Favored Foe.description: Circumstance bonus to certain checks against a type of opponent.

Grabbing Finesse.name: Grabbing Finesse
Grabbing Finesse.description: Substitute DEX for STR when making grab attacks.

Hide in Plain Sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
Hide in Plain Sight.description: Hide while observed without need for a diversion.

Improved Critical.name: Improved Critical
Improved Critical.description: +1 to critical threat range with an attack per rank.

Improved Defense.name: Improved Defense
Improved Defense.description: +2 bonus to active defense when you take the defend action.

Improved Disarm.name: Improved Disarm
Improved Disarm.description: No penalty for the disarm action.

Improved Grab.name: Improved Grab
Improved Grab.description: Make grab attacks with one arm.  Not vulnerable while grabbing.

Improved Hold.name: Improved Hold
Improved Hold.description: -5 circumstance penalty to escape from your holds.

Improved Initiative.name: Improved Initiative
Improved Initiative.description: +4 bonus to initiative checks per rank.

Improved Smash.name: Improved Smash
Improved Smash.description: No penalty for the smash action.

Improved Trip.name: Improved Trip
Improved Trip.description: No penalty for the trip action.

Improvised Tools.name: Improvised Tools
Improvised Tools.description: No penalty for using skills without tools.

Improvised Weapon.name: Improvised Weapon
Improvised Weapon.description: Use Close Combat: Unarmed skill with improvised weapons, +1 damage bonus.

Inspire.name: Inspire
Inspire.description: Spend a hero point to grant allies a +1 circumstance bonus per rank.

Instant Up.name: Instant Up
Instant Up.description: Stand from prone as a free action.

Interpose.name: Interpose
Interpose.description: Take an attack meant for an ally.

Inventor.name: Inventor
Inventor.description: Use Technology to create temporary devices.

Leadership.name: Leadership
Leadership.description: Spend a hero point to remove a condition from an ally.

Luck.name: Luck
Luck.description: Re-roll a die once per rank.

Minion.name: Minion
Minion.description: Gain a follower or minion with (15xrank) power points.

Move-by Action.name: Move-by Action
Move-by Action.description: Move both before and after your standard action.

Power Attack.name: Power Attack
Power Attack.description: Trade attack bonus for effect bonus.

Precise Attack.name: Precise Attack
Precise Attack.description: Ignore attack check penalties for either cover or concealment.

Prone Fighting.name: Prone Fighting
Prone Fighting.description: No penalties for fighting while prone.

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: Draw a weapon as a free action.

Ranged Attack.name: Ranged Attack
Ranged Attack.description: +1 bonus to ranged attack checks per rank.

Redirect.name: Redirect
Redirect.description: Use Deception to redirect a missed attack at another target.

Ritualist.name: Ritualist
Ritualist.description: Use Expertise (Magic) to create and perform rituals.

Second Chance.name: Second Chance
Second Chance.description: Re-roll a failed check against a hazard once.

Seize Initiative.name: Seize Initiative
Seize Initiative.description: Spend a hero point to go first in the initiative order.

Set-up.name: Set-up
Set-up.description: Transfer the benefit of an interaction skill to an ally.

Sidekick.name: Sidekick
Sidekick.description: Gain a sidekick with (5xrank) power points.

Skill Mastery.name: Skill Mastery
Skill Mastery.description: Make routine checks with one skill under any circumstances.

Startle.name: Startle
Startle.description: Use Intimidation to feint during combat.

Takedown.name: Takedown
Takedown.description: Free extra attack when you incapacitate a minion.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description: Use Deception to demoralize in combat.

Throwing Mastery.name: Throwing Mastery
Throwing Mastery.description: +1 damage bonus with thrown weapons per rank.

Trance.name: Trance
Trance.description: Go into a deathlike trance that slows bodily functions.

Ultimate Effort.name: Ultimate Effort
Ultimate Effort.description: Spend a hero point to get an effective 20 on a specific check.

Uncanny Dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description: Not vulnerable when surprised or caught off-guard.

Weapon Bind.name: Weapon Bind
Weapon Bind.description: Free disarm attempt when you actively defend.

Weapon Break.name: Weapon Break
Weapon Break.description: Free smash attack when you actively defend.

Well-Informed.name: Well-Informed
Well-Informed.description: Immediate Investigation or Persuasion check to know something.
